Series V: Departments, Chapters, and Divisions
Jewish Labor Committee Records, Part III
Jewish Labor Committee Records, Part III
Subseries D: Yiddish Cultural and Welfare Department
Subseries D: Yiddish Cultural and Welfare Department

The records of the Yiddish Department document the JLC's continuing relationship with Holocaust survivors and other Yiddish-speaking contacts in the U.S. and around the world, especially in Poland and Israel. The work of the Department was overseen by JLC Vice President Vladka Meed. The files document the JLC's support for Yiddish cultural projects and publications, aid to individual survivors and their families, involvement in programs seeking to reunite families after the war, publicity activity in the Yiddish press and on Yiddish radio, and relationships with other organizations dedicated to Yiddish culture.
